alert.note: Alert for Clayton; Coweta; Fayette; Henry; Meriwether; Newton; Rockdale; Spalding; Troup (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 5:54PM EDT until August 07 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Spalding County in west central Georgia... Southwestern Rockdale County in north central Georgia... Fayette County in north central Georgia... Northern Meriwether County in west central Georgia... Northwestern Henry County in north central Georgia... Northeastern Troup County in west central Georgia... Southeastern Coweta County in west central Georgia... Clayton County in north central Georgia... West central Newton County in north central Georgia... * Until 645 PM EDT. * At 554 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Palmetto to Harrisonville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Newnan, McDonough, Fayetteville, Jonesboro, Peachtree City, Stockbridge, Forest Park, Riverdale, Hampton, Tyrone, Morrow, Lovejoy, Senoia, Hogansville, Grantville, Lake City, Luthersville, Brooks, Moreland, and Sharpsburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.

area.areaDesc: Clayton; Coweta; Fayette; Henry; Meriwether; Newton; Rockdale; Spalding; Troup
